content:
# Alex Johnson

**Full-Stack Developer & Tech Entrepreneur**

Passionate software developer with 10+ years of experience building scalable web applications and leading technical teams. I love solving complex problems and creating solutions that make a real impact.

When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, or mentoring aspiring developers.

## Contact & Links

- 📍 San Francisco, CA
- 🌐 [Website](https://alexjohnson.dev)
- 💼 [LinkedIn](https://linkedin.com/in/alexjohnson)
- 🐙 [GitHub](https://github.com/alexjohnson)
- 🐦 [Twitter](https://twitter.com/alexjohnsondev)
- 🐘 [Mastodon](https://mastodon.social/@alexjohnson)
- 📝 [Blog](https://alexjohnson.dev/blog)

# DevCorp Solutions

**Enterprise Software Development Company**

DevCorp Solutions is a leading software development company specializing in enterprise applications, cloud infrastructure, and digital transformation.

Founded in 2015, we've helped over 200 companies modernize their technology stack and accelerate their digital initiatives.

## Our Presence

- 🏢 Multiple offices: SF, NYC, Austin
- 🌐 [Website](https://devcorp-solutions.com)

- 🐦 [Twitter](https://twitter.com/devCorpSolutions)
